Crit Effect

Type

Numbing Blow

Normal damage. The target is clumsy 1 for 1 minute and must succeed at a Reflex save or drop one item it holds at random.

Bludgeoning

Sucking chest Wound

The target is fatigued.

Piercing
Overhand Chop 1d8 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing
Knockback Push the target up to 10 feet.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #15
